Text: what are these .par2 files? what do i do with them? i used quickpar to extract something, but i didnt see any changes in the movie file. how do i get subtitles?

Ok, i thought someone would answer me, but noone did. so, for everyone who is willing to download this release:
-there are no english subtitles attached, only some .par2 files suitable only for deletion.
But as long as there is google- there is a solution and after a dozen of tries:
HERE ARE THE SUBTITLES FOR THIS RELEASE

http://subscene.com/english/Ponyo-on-the-Cliff-by-the-Sea-Gake-no-ue-no-Ponyo/subtitle-240067.aspx
Just rename it like the video file and voilÄ‚ !
